titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Right Honourable the Lords assembled in Parliament, upon the fast-day appointed, February 4. 1673/4 By Herbert Lord Bishop of Hereford.
titleStmt.author: Croft, Herbert, 1603-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Andrew Clark, for Charles Harper at the Flower-de-luce over against St. Dunstan's Church in Fleeetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Herbert Lord Bishop of Hereford = Herbert Croft.
The first leaf bears an order to print on verso.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.

place.placeName: the Flower-de-luce over against St. Dunstan's Church in Fleeetstreet
